body_html:
I am really not fond of either this solution, or the previous one where we added tf_copts to all the cc_library rules.
I have two alternate suggestions:

  • Setting the flag we need to pass in windows build through the windows Crosstool.
  • Writing the flag we need to pass in windows build in our bazelrc file during configure. We already write windows-specific things into our bazelrc anyway.

@meteorcloudy WDYT?
